text: Ghulami is a 2015 Indian action film directed by Tinu Verma and produced by Abhay Sinha's Yashi Films Pvt Ltd. The film stars Dinesh Lal Yadav Nirahua, Madhu Sharma, Sara Sharmaa, Tinu Verma, Sudesh Kaul, Kunal Singh, and Shubhi Sharma. ==Plot== A brave police officer from Salempur fights against a powerful gangster who wants to exploit the locals and rule the place. ==Cast== * Dinesh Lal Yadav Nirahua * Madhu Sharma * Shubhi Sharma * Tinu Verma * Sudesh Kaul * Kunal Singh * Sara Sharmaa * Apurva Ratann == Soundtrack == ==References== ==External links== * Category:2015 films Category:Indian films Category:Indian action films Category:2010s Hindi-language films Category:2010s Bhojpuri-language films Category:Films directed by Tinu Verma Category:2015 action films Category:2010s multilingual films Category:Indian multilingual films
title: Ghulami (2015 film)
